i cuddle up with my dog every night.

i m the youngest of five.

content.text: Hi, I'm (name). I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
Hey, I'm (name). I'm the youngest of five.
I'm five foot two inches tall.
I used to be self-conscious about it, but now I love it. It makes me feel like I'm more agile and I can fit into smaller spaces.
That's a good way to look at it!
Yeah, I try to focus on the positive aspects of my body.
I like that. I'm trying to do the same thing. I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
That sounds like fun! I love dogs. I have two cats, they are my best friends and help me to cope with my mental health.
That's great! I'm glad you have such good friends. I used to have a cat, but I had to give her up when I moved.
That's too bad. I'm sorry to hear that.
It's okay. I'm sure I'll get another one someday.
I hope you do! Cats are the best
